sentences.english: I can finally shed all of my heavy winter clothes.
sentences.chinese: 我終於能脫掉那些厚重的冬衣了。

sentences.english: Calls for warm clothing also have been met with a strong response.
sentences.chinese: 有人呼籲捐助冬衣，也獲得熱烈響應。

sentences.english: It was time to put the winter clothes away.
sentences.chinese: 是該收拾冬衣的時候了。

sentences.english: I untied the burden inside my winter coat and two bottles of malted .
sentences.chinese: 我解開包袱，裏面是我的冬衣和兩瓶麥乳精。

sentences.english: The story said children were in need of winter clothes.
sentences.chinese: 這篇報道說孩子們缺乏冬衣。

sentences.english: His winter suit has been badly wormed.
sentences.chinese: 他的冬衣被蟲蛀得一塌糊塗。

sentences.english: We are now having a preseason sale on all our winter apparel.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們的正在進行冬衣的季節性促銷。

sentences.english: Now we are all in our winter clothing.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們都穿着溫暖的冬衣了。

sentences.english: All the refugees were issued with winter clothing.
sentences.chinese: 所有的難民都被髮給了冬衣。

sentences.english: I buttoned my dress shirt over it and my winter coat, too.
sentences.chinese: 我用襯衫和冬衣遮住我的心痛，我希望它不要太明顯。

definition: to defend against the cold/to keep warm
quilted cotton trousers/cotton-padded trousers (worn in winter)
coat/jacket/short and lined coat or robe
